name: Coot Grant
description: '''Coot Grant''' (June 11 or 17, 1893 – December 26, 1970) was an American [[classic female blues]], [[country blues]], and [[vaudeville]] singer and songwriter. On her own and with her husband and musical partner, [[Wesley Wilson|Wesley "Kid" Wilson]], she was popular with African American audiences from the 1910s to the early 1930s.
